contentrichtext.text: {| border="1" cellpadding="2" cellspacing="0" style="float:right; empty-cells:show; margin-left:1em; margin-bottom:0,5em; background:#FFDEAD;" <!--! Coat of Arms ! Flag |---- bgcolor="#FFFFFF" ! align="center" | [[Image:NatividadedaSerraSPBRcoa.png]] ! align="center" | [[Image:NatividadedaSerraSPBRflag.png]] |- ! colspan="2" | Map |---- bgcolor="#FFFFFF" ! align="center" | [[Image:NatividadedaSerraPBRmap.png]] |- --> ! colspan="2" | Statistics |---- bgcolor="#FFFFFF" | [[States of Brazil|State]]: || [[São Paulo (state)|São Paulo]] |---- bgcolor="#FFFFFF" | [[Divisions of São Paulo#Microrregions|Microrregion]]: || [[Taubaté]] |---- bgcolor="#FFFFFF" | Founded: || May 29, 1853 |---- bgcolor="#FFFFFF" valign="top" | [[Location (geography)|Location]]: || 23.375/23°22'32" S, 45.4/45°26'31" W |---- bgcolor="#FFFFFF" | [[Area]]: || 834.69 km² |---- bgcolor="#FFFFFF" | [[Population]]: || 7,205 <small>(2004)</small><br><small>[[List of municipalities in the state of São Paulo by population|Ranked 407th]]</small> |---- bgcolor="#FFFFFF" | [[Population density]]: || 8.63/km²<!-- |---- bgcolor="#FFFFFF" | Subdivisions: || |---- bgcolor="#FFFFFF" | [[Elevation]]: || m--> |---- bgcolor="#FFFFFF" | [[List of postal codes in Brazil#São Paulo|Postal code]]: || 12180-xxx |---- bgcolor="#FFFFFF" | [[List of Brazilian area codes|Area/distance code]]: || (00)55-[[Brazilian area code 12|12]]<!-- |---- bgcolor="#FFFFFF" | [[Brazilian Institute of Geography and Statistics|IBGE]] code: || - |---- bgcolor="#FFFFFF" | Name of habitants: || ---> |---- bgcolor="#FFFFFF" | Website: || [http://www.natividadedaserra.sp.gov.br www.natividadedaserra.sp.gov.br]<!-- |---- bgcolor="#FFFFFF" ! colspan="2" | Politics |---- bgcolor="#FFFFFF" | [[Mayor]]: ||--> |} {{coord|23|22|32|S|45|26|31|W|scale:30000|display=title}} '''Natividade da Serra''' (meaning "the nativity of the mountain") is a municipality/county in the state of [[São Paulo (state)|São Paulo]] in [[Brazil]]. The population in 2004 is 7,205 and the area is 834.69 km². The elevation is 720 m. The southern part is heavily forested and mountainous and there are few roads and tracks into the mountain. The hills and some mountains with farmlands dominate the rest of the municipality. ==External links== * {{pt icon}} [http://www.natividadedaserra.sp.gov.br/municipio.htm Official site] * {{pt icon}} [http://www.citybrazil.com.br/SP/natividadedaserra citybrazil.com.br] * {{pt icon}} [http://www.explorevale.com.br/cidades/natividadedaserra/index.htm Natividade da Serra on Explorevale] {| width ="75%" border = 2 align="center" |----- | width ="35%" align="center" | | width ="30%" align="center" | '''North:''' [[Redenção da Serra]] and [[São Luís do Paraitinga]] | width ="35%" align="center" | |----- | width ="10%" align="center" | '''West:''' [[Paraibuna]] | width ="35%" align="center" | '''Natividade da Serra''' | width ="30%" align="center" | '''East:''' [[São Luís do Paraitinga]] |----- | width ="35%" align="center" | | width ="30%" align="center" | '''South:''' [[Caraguatatuba]] | width ="35%" align="center" | '''Southeast:''' [[Ubatuba]] |} [[Category:Populated places in São Paulo (state)]] {{SaoPauloState-geo-stub}}
